blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: theme nights where you and harry are out somewhere and you two had a fight beforehand and you’re sitting at somewhat distance...
question: theme nights where you and harry are out somewhere and you two had a fight beforehand and you’re sitting at somewhat distance next to him so he grabs your chair and slides you next to him and puts his arm around you so you’re secured and cannot move away from him because you two know this fight doesn’t impact anything. thoughts?
answer:
“y’closing off on me again.”

harry mumbles, more on to himself than to you, at this state because by now does he notice that what used to be his literal foot’s distance away from the leg of your chair is now at his arm’s length.

he knows why but god does he really want to play dumb at the moment, being akin to a child refusing to admit to their mistake of perhaps being the one to draw on the wall with crayons — when in fact that the said bub is the only one in the house with crayons.

harry, for sure, knows that his missus is just as stubborn and as pissed as he is yet he knows that he still can’t shake off whatever feeling of doubt or heaviness that accompanies him after every little tiff that gets his eyes narrowed.

after every little fight that gets his lips pout and have a huff out of them in the next second.

after every little banter that either gets him avoiding you even if it meant having his shoulder against the wall coming down the stairs when you’re coming up, or having himself collide with you at every possible chance he gets.

he, for the love of god, still can’t seem to shake off the feeling of wrongness in him that it irks him up to his bones and to the back of his ears with an involuntary shudder — a frown gracing his face more often in the past hour than in the past month.

he only closes in on you again this time, pulling your chair against the wooden floors without so much of a care for how loud the sound it makes and how much pairs of eyes he’s attracting — as long as it meant that his missus is just close to him until your shoulders bump to his.

harry slumps against his chair, now content and without even looking at his lovie does he set his eyes on his lap, diverting gazes to the large window of a mutual friend’s house, before lacing his fingers with yours; a silent apology of some sort.

“we’re not sleeping angry tonight.”

blog.name: haylorinwonderland
blog.title: Robin Sparkles
blog.description: If you want, come scroll through this account for haylor quotes and other haylor related content. Feel free to ask me questions. Hopefully, I’m not the only one left fascinated with Harry and Taylor’s history.

summary: This for me fits perfectly with H&T, I wonder if they still talk sometimes because I remember in 2014/15 she said they remained...
body: This for me fits perfectly with H&T, I wonder if they still talk sometimes because I remember in 2014/15 she said they remained friends but it seems it did not last that long. Did she call when Robin passed? Why did their friendship not work? These are some questions I think about.

reblog.comment: This for me fits perfectly with H&T, I wonder if they still talk sometimes because I remember in 2014/15 she said they remained friends but it seems it did not last that long. Did she call when Robin passed? Why did their friendship not work? These are some questions I think about.

Did she call when Robin passed? Why did their friendship not work? These are some questions I think about.

blog.name: peppermintstranger
blog.title: Pepper
blog.description:
Tumblr dedicated to faceclaims.
You are free to ask if you are looking for some particular face. I'm here to help c:

summary: hey pepper, do you have anyone who looks like she could be harry styles' younger sister, like between 17-21. thank you so much.
question: hey pepper, do you have anyone who looks like she could be harry styles' younger sister, like between 17-21. thank you so much.
answer:
Hi there!

title: Literal Amnesia
body:
From YouTube sensation to worldwide sensation…and I cant remember a thing.

Chapter 3

Laney’s POVThey have fluids running through me. I’ve had ct scans blood tests and other tests I will probably never know the names of. No one’s giving me many answers,although I’ve been…

summary: my friend’s nephew who’s three has this habit of ‘walking like a dinosaur’ and making these weird roaring sounds, it’s so cute....
question: my friend’s nephew who’s three has this habit of ‘walking like a dinosaur’ and making these weird roaring sounds, it’s so cute. I have w feeling that’s something Harry and y/n’s son would do, they’d just record it😂😂
answer:
Oh my god he would definitely do this with his nipper!

To the point the little’un can’t stop giggling and he’s rolling around on the floor in hysterics while Harry is towering over him doing a bloody t-rex impression! 😂

reblog.comment:
